backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and workshop registrations with access control, duplicate checks, and admin-only queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level landing page layout with hero content, workshop info, and embedded registration form plus floating WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationForm: Client registration form with validation, backend submission, duplicate handling, and automatic WhatsApp redirect on success.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating button that opens the WhatsApp group link in a new tab with icon and visible label.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegisterMutation.t: Defines a React Query mutation for registering users via an actor, handling error normalization and invalidating registration queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables using OKLCH for the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation for full name, email, and WhatsApp numbers with normalization for Indian formats.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappRedirect.ts: Implements a best‑effort WhatsApp redirect, attempting top‑window navigation with fallback to current window.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current requirements, issues, and architectural notes for a high‑traffic workshop landing page with registration and WhatsApp redirect flows.
